1370: Sylof was born in Davids hof in 1370.
Got married to bertrade at age 19 in 1370.
1373: Had a daughter with bertrade, Amelgeir, at age 22.
1375: Had a daughter with bertrade, Ghela, at age 24.
1376: Had a daughter with bertrade, Heilsota, at age 25.
1378: Had a daughter with bertrade, Nannen, at age 27.
1380: Had a son with bertrade, Betten, at age 29.
1382: Lost daughter Ghela when Ghela was 8 years old.
1383: Had a daughter with bertrade, Ermegardis, at age 32.
Lost daughter Amelgeir when Amelgeir was 11 years old.
1384: Had a daughter with bertrade, Folqui, at age 33.
